docstring.short_description: Calculate the power of two numeric arrays, vectors, matrices, or constants element-wise.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: The input a used to compute a to the power of b.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: The input b used to compute a to the power of b.

returns.description:
OrderedPair if a is an OrderedPair.
x: the x-axis of input a.
y: the result of a^b (or a**b).

Scalar if a is a Scalar.
c: the result of a^b (or a**b).

Vector if a is a Vector.
v: the result of a^b (or a**b).
